60  double getFilterOutput(int inputIdx, int filterIdx) {
61  const int idx = inputIdx * nFiltersPerInput + filterIdx;
62  assert((idx >= 0) || (idx < (nFiltersPerInput * nInputs)));
63  return filterbankOutputs[idx];
64  }
